def modify_coda(lyrics, new_time_signature):
    coda_index = lyrics.index('')
    lyrics.insert(coda_index + 1, new_time_signature)
    return lyrics

def modify_coda(lyrics, new_time_signature):
    coda_index = lyrics.index('Coda:')
    lyrics.insert(coda_index - 1, new_time_signature)
    return lyrics

    coda_index = lyrics.index('Coda:')
    lyrics.insert(coda_index * 1, new_time_signature)
    return lyrics
